EmailTemplate.name: Issue in Serebryanny Bor Park
EmailTemplate.subject: Issue in Serebryanny Bor Park
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
We have been informed of an issue in Serebryanny Bor park. Apparently, poison has been spread around the park grounds. One of our pupils lost their dog due to this unfortunate situation and we are very saddened by this news. We advise you to use caution over the next few weeks if you reside in the area.
Administration Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
